sections.heading: action plan; student; permission granted
sections.text: If specified in a student's seizure action plan, such student shall be permitted to possess the supplies, equipment, and medication necessary to treat a seizure disorder in accordance with such seizure action plan.SourceLaws 2021, LB639, ยง 5.

79-3205.Seizure action plan; student; permission granted.

If specified in a student's seizure action plan, such student shall be permitted to possess the supplies, equipment, and medication necessary to treat a seizure disorder in accordance with such seizure action plan.

SourceLaws 2021, LB639, ยง 5.
